report.title: RSLTE256 - LTE Alarm Details
report.help-text:
This report is divided in 3 parts. The first part, provides a daily summary of the most relevant alarms (total and unique per object). The second part, provides detailed information about individual alarms
of the LTE radio network elements (MRBTS, LNBTS, FTM and LNCEL). Last change: 2013-09-24 by Reinhard. Last change 24.10.2013

report.sql:
select f.alarm_time ,f.ne_gid ,f.severity ,f.alarm_number ,f.alarm_type ,f.text ,f.supplementary_info ,f.diagnostic_info ,f.cancel_time from #grouping_sql# fx_alarm f ,utp_common_objects plmn ,utp_common_objects mrbts ,utp_common_objects lnbts ,utp_common_objects lncel where f.ne_gid = lncel.co_gid and f.alarm_time >= to_date( '#start_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and f.alarm_time < to_date( '#end_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') /* and to_char(f.alarm_time,'HH24') not in (1,2,3,4,5,6) */ and plmn.co_oc_id = 16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #object_selection#
union all select f.alarm_time ,f.ne_gid ,f.severity ,f.alarm_number ,f.alarm_type ,f.text ,f.supplementary_info ,f.diagnostic_info ,f.cancel_time from #grouping_sql# fx_alarm f ,utp_common_objects plmn ,utp_common_objects mrbts ,utp_common_objects lnbts ,utp_common_objects ftm where f.ne_gid = ftm.co_gid and f.alarm_time >= to_date( '#start_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and f.alarm_time < to_date( '#end_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') /* and to_char(f.alarm_time,'HH24') not in (1,2,3,4,5,6) */ and plmn.co_oc_id = 16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and ftm.co_oc_id=1793 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and ftm.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #object_selection#
union all select f.alarm_time ,f.ne_gid ,f.severity ,f.alarm_number ,f.alarm_type ,f.text ,f.supplementary_info ,f.diagnostic_info ,f.cancel_time from #grouping_sql# fx_alarm f ,utp_common_objects plmn ,utp_common_objects mrbts ,utp_common_objects lnbts where f.ne_gid = lnbts.co_gid and f.alarm_time >= to_date( '#start_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and f.alarm_time < to_date( '#end_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') /* and to_char(f.alarm_time,'HH24') not in (1,2,3,4,5,6) */ and plmn.co_oc_id = 16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and #object_selection#
union all select f.alarm_time ,f.ne_gid ,f.severity ,f.alarm_number ,f.alarm_type ,f.text ,f.supplementary_info ,f.diagnostic_info ,f.cancel_time from #grouping_sql# fx_alarm f ,utp_common_objects plmn ,utp_common_objects mrbts where f.ne_gid = mrbts.co_gid and f.alarm_time >= to_date( '#start_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and f.alarm_time < to_date( '#end_timestamp#', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') /* and to_char(f.alarm_time,'HH24') not in (1,2,3,4,5,6) */ and plmn.co_oc_id = 16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #object_selection#
report.literal: Daily summary table for the most important alarm events and for the selected LTE radio object hierarchy. Alarms occurring during the maintenance window period (1 am to 7 am) are excluded.

report.literal: Available alarms in database for the selected LTE radio object hierarchy and time
report.sql: select alarm_number ,rpad(text,60) text ,count(*) tot_num ,ne_gid ne_gid from #celldoc1_023# group by alarm_number ,rpad(text,60) ,ne_gid

Available alarms
By default all available alarms are displayed. You can select which alarm you want to view in the threshold definitions SELECT SUM(tot_num) tot_num ,SUBSTR(text,1,60) text ,TO_CHAR(alarm_number,'99999') alm_id FROM #celldoc2_023# GROUP BY SUBSTR(text,1,60) ,TO_CHAR(alarm_number,'99999') ORDER BY tot_num DESC, alm_id ASC

report.sql:
Available alarms in database for the selected objects and time
By default all available alarms are displayed. You can select which alarm you want to view in the threshold definitions select a.alarm_number alarm_number ,decode(a.severity,1,'CRITICAL',2,'MAJOR',3,'MINOR',4,'WARNING',a.severity) severity ,decode(a.alarm_type,1,'COMMUNICATION',2,'ENVIRONMENTAL',3,'EQUIPMENT',4,'PROCESSING',5,'QUALITY OF SERVICE',a.alarm_type) alarm_type ,a.text text ,a.supplementary_info ,nvl(object.co_name, 'NN('||object.co_dn||')') object ,objclass.oc_abbreviation object_type ,to_char(a.alarm_time,'yyyy-MON-dd') alarm_date ,to_char(a.alarm_time,'hh24:mi:ss') alarm_time ,decode(TO_CHAR(CANCEL_TIME,'yyyy-MON-dd'),'','hold',to_char(cancel_time,'yyyy-MON-dd')) end_date ,decode(to_char(CANCEL_TIME,'dd-mm-yy'),'','hold',TO_CHAR(CANCEL_TIME,'hh24:mi:ss')) end_time ,round(((cancel_time-alarm_time)*24*60*60),0) zse ,a.diagnostic_info from #celldoc1_023# a ,utp_common_objects object ,utp_object_class objclass where a.ne_gid = object.co_gid and object.co_oc_id = objclass.oc_id #add_on_criteria# ORDER BY a.alarm_number ASC ,a.alarm_time DESC
